title: Dreams Come True: A Sweet Romance
description: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ A beautiful, emotional story!⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ It is a phenomenal Christmas story you don't want to pass up.Ever since she was a little girl, Madeline Parker always dreamed of a Christmas wedding.The surreal idea of walking down the aisle in a beautiful gown, surrounded by family and friends warmed her inner soul.Now, in her late-twenties and successful in her own right as Chief Executive Officer of Dreams Come True, the day fast approaches.On Christmas Day, she will marry Scott; her perfect man, and fiancé of five years.From classical music to the winter flowers chosen to decorate the quaint country church, the finer details and finishing touches are organized and checked off.Unfortunately, happiness is snatched away at the last minute as Madeline is cruelly jilted at the altar leaving her heartbroken and believing true love is a lie.Since then, life for Madeline remained cloaked in disbelief, until a chance encounter with Austin Roarke, an old school acquaintance reignites the hope in her heart.
author: Zane Michaelson
